'''A Thank-You Letter to All Travelers''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 3.3]].

Dear Travelers,

Thanks to your support, Genshin Impact has won the "Players' Voice" award, and was nominated for the "Best Mobile Game" and "Best Ongoing" categories at The Game Awards 2022. Thank you for coming alongside us through this journey!

To thank you for your support, we will be giving out Primogems ×800 from Dec.10 to Dec.13.

==How to Claim Rewards==
[[Primogem]]s ×200 shall be given out to Travelers via in-game mail at 00:00 (Server Time) each day from Dec. 10 to Dec. 13.
